content:
{思考中}Did I leave the stove on when I left?
Wait—was I even cooking soup today?
Was it a sweet soup? A bamboo and sugarcane concoction? Lotus seeds and lily bulbs perhaps?

content:
{思考中}Dragon Lobster Fist, the 17th move...
Should I lead with the fist or the claw?
Or maybe I could invent a new style with left fist and right claw?

content:
(Points at the sky) "A line of seagulls over the Milky Way"!
Why does this feel both familiar yet strange?
What was the original line?
